SEARCH

Class user

java.lang.Object
user
public class user extends Object
User object for each account used in the application

Users require: A username A password An array of favourite POIs An arraylist of created POIs A boolean for if they are an admin Example use: user newUser = new user("guest", "abcdefg", [10000, 1045], [POI1, POI2], false);
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jaden Keeble

  • Constructor Details

    • user

      public user(String username, String password, boolean admin, int[] favouriteList, ArrayList<POI> pointsOfInterest)
      The constructor for the user class.
      Parameters:
      username - The new user's username.
      password - The new user's password. This will be hashed before it is stored within the .json files.
      admin - Whether the user is an admin or not. This will default to no for new users.
      favouriteList - The user's list of favourites.
      pointsOfInterest - The user's list of point of interests.

  • Method Details

    • getUserName

      public String getUserName()
      Return the username of the active user.
      Returns:
      The active user's username.

    • getPassword

      public String getPassword()
      Retrieve the password of the active user
      Returns:
      The active user's password

    • getFavouriteList

      public int[] getFavouriteList()
      Return the favourite list of the active user.
      Returns:
      The active user's favourite list.

    • getPointsOfInterest

      public ArrayList<POI> getPointsOfInterest()
      Return the point of interest list of the active user.
      Returns:
      The active user's point of interest list.

    • addFavourites

      public void addFavourites(int id)
      Adds a favourite to the user's list of favourites.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the point of interest the user wants to favourite.

    • addPointOfInterest

      public void addPointOfInterest(int id, int x, int y, int width, int height, BufferedImage image, int screen, String metadata, String buildingName, int floor)
      Add a point of interest to the user's list of point of interests.
      Parameters:
      x - The x map coordinate of the point of interest.
      y - The y map coordinate of the point of interest.
      width - The width of the point of interest.
      height - The height of the point of interest.
      image - The image to use to represent the point of interest.

    • removeFavourite

      public void removeFavourite(int id)
      Remove a favourite from the user's list of favourites.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the point of interest to remove.

    • isAdmin

      public boolean isAdmin()
      Checks whether the current user is an administrator for the application.
      Returns:
      True if the user is an administrator, False otherwise.

    • removePoi

      public void removePoi(int id)
      Method to remove a POI from this user instance's POI list
      Parameters:
      id - Integer of the POI id to remove
